description:
28-year old Hashiba Kyoya has hit a new low after losing his job at a shady game developer. He chose to pursue a business degree instead of going to art school, his attempts to get into creative fields has only resulted in frustration. But when he finds himself ten years in the past, with the memories of his dead-end future intact, he gets a chance to remake his life for the better.
Source: crunchyroll
